title: Poster, 1972
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in white lower left: Blatt 7 / der Ausstellungserie / herausgegeben vem / Organisationskomitee / für die Spiele / der XX Olympiade / München 1972 [ logo of the Munich Olympics]
Imprinted in white lower right: St.Koloman, Germany  Photo by Hans Hansen 07.700217
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Color photographic reproduction of a field of yellow flowers in the foreground that fills three-quarters of the sheet. In the distance a white church with a brown-red roof surrounded by trees. Mountains in the distance. Texture of image is grainy.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1972.
1972. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-159.
